Na parte exterior do pacote, por favor, inclua um lembrete com seu nome e o nº de referência [redacted_info].

Atenciosamente,

In addition to this, it is necessary to pick up the product, I will show how you must prepare the sample for our transportation service to pick it up.
• Snacks: close the bag with a clipper or tweezers and put it in an envelope or bag.
On the external side of the package, please include a note with your name and the reference number [redacted_info].
Our pick-up service may pass by the house that you inform in the daily shift from 09:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. or in the afternoon shift from 4:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. We need you to inform us of the day and shift so we can come by to pick up the sample.
Your data will be treated in accordance with the private policy of PepsiCo available at  https://pepsicoprivacypolicy.com/es/home. It's possible to exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, and restriction of the processing and portability by sending an email to TrustArc.
You can ask for information about it by answering this email or calling 808.200.969.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Sincerely,
Customer's support - Pepsico
Phone number 808.200.969
Schedule: From Monday to Friday working days from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m.
